trans-unit.source: Represents a handle that has been registered when calling <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(System.Threading.WaitHandle,System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback,System.Object,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示在调用 <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(System.Threading.WaitHandle,System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback,System.Object,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)" /> 时已注册的句柄。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> to determine why a callback method is called, and how to unregister a task if the callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>以确定原因调用回调方法，以及如何取消注册一个任务，如回调出现由于等待句柄已收到信号。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how to use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>时要执行方法指定的回调方法指定的等待句柄处于有信号状态。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，回调方法是`WaitProc`，和等待句柄是<xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了`TaskInfo`类来保存时它将执行传递给回调的信息。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建`TaskInfo`对象并将其分配某些字符串数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> that is returned by the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>返回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法分配给`Handle`字段`TaskInfo`对象，以便回调方法有权<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>。

trans-unit.source: In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method specifies the <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent> that the task will wait for, a <xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback> delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 除了指定`TaskInfo`作为要传递给回调方法，调用的对象<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法指定<xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>任务将等待，<xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback>委托，表示`WaitProc`回调方法一秒的超时间隔和多个回调。

trans-unit.source: When the main thread signals the <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent> by calling its <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> method, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback> delegate is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当主线程发出信号<xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>通过调用其<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>方法，<xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback>调用委托。

trans-unit.source: The `WaitProc` method tests <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> to determine whether a time-out occurred.
trans-unit.target: `WaitProc`方法测试<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>以确定是否发生超时。

trans-unit.source: If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>, stopping additional callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于等待句柄已收到信号，而调用的回调`WaitProc`方法注销<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>，从而停止其他回调。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait.
trans-unit.target: 对于超时，该任务将继续等待。

trans-unit.source: The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console.
trans-unit.target: `WaitProc`方法结束时将消息输出到控制台。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> to be signaled.
trans-unit.target: 要发出信号的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a registered wait operation issued by the <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(System.Threading.WaitHandle,System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback,System.Object,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取消由 <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(System.Threading.WaitHandle,System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback,System.Object,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)" /> 方法发出的已注册等待操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the function succeeds; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `waitObject` is specified, it is signaled only if the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> is successfully unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 如果`waitObject`指定，它才会终止<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>已成功注销。

trans-unit.source: If a callback method is in progress when <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A> executes, `waitObject` is not signaled until the callback method completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果回调方法正在进行时<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A>执行，`waitObject`直到回调方法完成之后才会终止。

trans-unit.source: In particular, if a callback method executes <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A>, `waitObject` is not signaled until that callback method completes.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，如果执行回调方法<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A>，`waitObject`直到该回调方法完成之后才会终止。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A> method to unregister a task if a callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle.Unregister%2A>方法来注销任务，如果回调发生由于等待句柄已收到信号。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how to use the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何使用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>时要执行方法指定的回调方法指定的等待句柄处于有信号状态。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，回调方法是`WaitProc`，和等待句柄是<xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了`TaskInfo`类来保存时它将执行传递给回调的信息。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建`TaskInfo`对象并将其分配某些字符串数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> that is returned by the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>返回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法分配给`Handle`字段`TaskInfo`对象，以便回调方法有权<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>。

trans-unit.source: In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> method specifies the <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent> that the task will wait for, a <xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback> delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 除了指定`TaskInfo`作为要传递给回调方法，调用的对象<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>方法指定<xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>任务将等待，<xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback>委托，表示`WaitProc`回调方法一秒的超时间隔和多个回调。

trans-unit.source: When the main thread signals the <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent> by calling its <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> method, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback> delegate is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当主线程发出信号<xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>通过调用其<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>方法，<xref:System.Threading.WaitOrTimerCallback>调用委托。

trans-unit.source: The `WaitProc` method tests <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle> to determine whether a time-out occurred.
trans-unit.target: `WaitProc`方法测试<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>以确定是否发生超时。

trans-unit.source: If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the <xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>, stopping additional callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于等待句柄已收到信号，而调用的回调`WaitProc`方法注销<xref:System.Threading.RegisteredWaitHandle>，从而停止其他回调。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait.
trans-unit.target: 对于超时，该任务将继续等待。

trans-unit.source: The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console.
trans-unit.target: `WaitProc`方法结束时将消息输出到控制台。
